definition: plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker

sentences.english: A fresh meat store recently opened in the food market.
sentences.chinese: 菜場新開了一家專賣冷鮮肉的店鋪。

sentences.english: Do you think MTR provide enough types of MTR shops?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲地鐵所提供的車站店鋪種類足夠嗎？

sentences.english: The space is dotted with various types of houses and tradesman 's workshops with their messy yards.
sentences.chinese: 其間還點綴着各種住宅和商人的店鋪和各式院子。

sentences.english: In many regions, stores can now open or close whenever they want.
sentences.chinese: 現在，許多地區的店鋪都可以想開到幾點就開到幾點。

sentences.english: To provide images, allows you to add luster to the shop.
sentences.chinese: 提供圖片，讓您的店鋪增添光彩。

sentences.english: I've been shopping in gazillion department stores with my mom throughout the week.
sentences.chinese: 這整個星期，我和我媽媽已經逛了成千上萬家店鋪了。

sentences.english: Need a custom header and footer created for a big commerce store.
sentences.chinese: 需要自定義頁眉和頁腳創建一個大的商業店鋪。

sentences.english: Mr. Lopez was cleaning the store.
sentences.chinese: 羅培茲先生正在打掃店鋪。

sentences.english: The pies in the store window made my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 店鋪櫥窗裏擺的餡餅我饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: Nagarahole, The Shop or The Shrine?
sentences.chinese: 納加爾霍雷，店鋪，還是聖地？

sentences.english: Aime jokingly asked if I wanted to go into one of the places, but I declined.
sentences.chinese: 艾梅開玩笑問我想不想進去某個店鋪裏，我推辭了。

sentences.english: His inconsolable widow continued to keep the wine-shop.
sentences.chinese: 他的遺孀，得不到一點安慰，繼續開着那店鋪。

sentences.english: This has put pressure on intermediaries from both on-line and traditional shops.
sentences.chinese: 這就加大了對中介機構從網上和傳統店鋪的壓力。

sentences.english: Lit graphics, written in large bold font the name of your shop and service.
sentences.chinese: 點亮了圖形，寫在大字體加粗你的店鋪的名稱和服務。

sentences.english: This is a first option to consider if you are about to design the store with a rather unspectacular profile.
sentences.chinese: 這是你在爲店鋪設計之前首要考慮的。

sentences.english: It looks like (Hurricane) Katrina went through the store.
sentences.chinese: 感覺就像卡特里納颶風橫掃過店鋪。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
to engage in (business etc)/to run/to operate
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
to open a business/to open a practice/open (for business)
